isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (with R-134a Refrigerant System) - TROUBLESHOOTING - COMPRESSOR HAS EXCESSIVE VIBRATION OR NOISE

svcproc.title: COMPRESSOR HAS EXCESSIVE VIBRATION OR NOISE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 34 for a general procedure to troubleshoot the 'COMPRESSOR HAS EXCESSIVE VIBRATION OR NOISE' problem.

For detailed information and troubleshooting on electrical circuits, refer to the Group 8 ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS; ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE; and/or HEATING, VENTILATION AND AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE, in the MASTER SERVICE MANUAL, for the vehicle being serviced.

figure.caption: Figure 34. Compressor Has Excessive Vibration or Noise
